forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East northeast wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle morning envelops Downtown San Francisco, where the sky, clear and bright, promises a day steeped in sunshine. The cool air brushes softly against your skin, reminiscent of a day that straddles the boundary between autumn and winter. As the sun ascends, temperatures dance around the lower sixties, a refreshing warmth tempered by light northeast winds. You may notice a slight bite in the breeze, a reminder of the ocean’s proximity, yet no fog idles over the hills or creeps through the city, leaving an unobstructed view of the Golden Gate and beyond.

As twilight approaches, the charm of the evening beckons with the sky’s colors transitioning toward deeper hues. An early night promises moments to enjoy, whether it be a stroll through peaceful park pathways or an invitation to the local café, where steaming mugs and soft conversations drift in the air. Dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket complements the day’s mildness while keeping you warm as night settles in. With a day like this, an exploration of the quieter corners of the city might reveal hidden gems, far removed from the bustle. Embrace the charm of simplicity, where every choice feels a touch golden, much like the setting sun.
